name: Timeflux: Metro
description:
- One Month Challenge: March Entry -  TIMEFLUX: METRO

“Time... Our greatest defense against the chaos of this world."

Timeflux: Metro is a short, first-person cyber-punk detective mystery game. It’s a race against the clock where the final conclusion comes down to you the player. Play as a temporal agent sent back in time to stop the heinous event known as "The Big One".  Investigate the underground metro, talk to civilians to uncover clues, slow down time to explore restricted areas all while racing against time.

Key features:
  • A time-ticking, cyber-punk detective experience 
  • A short 15 minute experience that can be completed in one sitting
  • An experience that focuses on problem solving and puzzles rather than action or combat
  • An original environment that rewards players who like to solve mysteries
